google_reviews.author: Taylor Truong
google_reviews.review: If you love silverfish you should live here!! I lived in Sandpiper (unit 211) and it was infested with silverfish all year. I started noticing them 3 months into moving in. Because Im scared of bugs, I mostly stayed in my partners apartment so I was rarely at my own. Still, with the dehumidifier running almost every day & barely using the bathroom to prevent moisture, they were everywhere. The apartment helped me by calling Pest Control and so around 75% of the silverfish I would find were already dead. But its gross. The whole building is infested, my friend who moved into a unit above mine recently found some in her bathroom as well. Other than that, Im giving it 2 stars for being modern, affordable, and downtown accessible housing. I loved everything else about living here except the Silverfish & my upstairs gaming neighbor who would scream and bang on his desk until 4am every night :)

summary.text:
Good

The Sandpiper is noted for its responsive service, with users highlighting that they received help promptly when issues arose. One tenant appreciated the management's efforts in addressing pest control by calling in professionals to tackle the silverfish problem, indicating that there is an intention to maintain the property despite some shortcomings. The building's modern amenities and affordability, along with its convenient downtown location, also received positive remarks from tenants, suggesting that many feel the aesthetic and logistical aspects of the property meet their needs.

Additionally, the downtown accessibility is a significant advantage for tenants who prioritize being near urban conveniences. The overall ambiance of the apartments is described as up-to-date, which aligns well with the modern living preferences of many renters today. Despite the challenges faced by some tenants, the existence of responsive management strengthens the positive perception of the property.

Great

User reviews do suggest that The Sandpiper has offered an overall satisfactory experience for some renters, especially highlighting the excellent service from the management. One user specifically mentioned great service and responsiveness, indicating that the team is available and willing to assist tenants when they reach out. This level of support can greatly enhance a tenant's living experience, making it easier to navigate any issues that may arise during their stay.

The building's modern design and location are consistently mentioned as highlights, making it an attractive choice for young professionals and those seeking a vibrant community. With an average rating of 3.5 out of 5, there exists a segment of renters who found the property to exceed their expectations in various aspects, particularly in service quality.

Bad

Ugly

While most reviews were moderate, one looming issue is the ongoing pest problem that was reported as having significantly disrupted a tenant's living experience. The silverfish infestation affected multiple units, indicating a potential systemic issue within the building that has not been adequately resolved. Such pest concerns can tarnish the reputation of the property and create an uncomfortable living environment for all residents.
